trans-unit.source: FAQ: Publish and use Machine Learning apps in Azure Marketplace | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: FAQ: Publish and use Machine Learning apps in Azure Marketplace | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Frequently Asked Questions
trans-unit.target: Frequently Asked Questions

trans-unit.source: Publishing and using Machine Learning apps in the Azure Marketplace: FAQ
trans-unit.target: Publishing and using Machine Learning apps in the Azure Marketplace: FAQ

trans-unit.source: Questions about consuming from Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Questions about consuming from Marketplace

trans-unit.source: 1. Why do I get the following error message after I enter input for the web service:
trans-unit.target: 1. Why do I get the following error message after I enter input for the web service:

trans-unit.source: The request resulted in a back-end time out or back-end error.
trans-unit.target: The request resulted in a back-end time out or back-end error.

trans-unit.source: The team is investigating the issue.
trans-unit.target: The team is investigating the issue.

trans-unit.source: We are sorry for the inconvenience.
trans-unit.target: We are sorry for the inconvenience.

trans-unit.source: Your input parameter(s) may not conform to the required format for the specific web service.
trans-unit.target: Your input parameter(s) may not conform to the required format for the specific web service.

trans-unit.source: Please refer to the corresponding documentation link to find the correct format for input parameters and the limitations of this web service.
trans-unit.target: Please refer to the corresponding documentation link to find the correct format for input parameters and the limitations of this web service.

trans-unit.source: 2. If I copy the API link for the web service that I see on the "Explore this dataset" page and paste it into another browser window, what credentials should I use to access the results, and how do I see them?
trans-unit.target: 2. If I copy the API link for the web service that I see on the "Explore this dataset" page and paste it into another browser window, what credentials should I use to access the results, and how do I see them?

trans-unit.source: You should use your Marketplace account as the username and the primary account key as the password.
trans-unit.target: You should use your Marketplace account as the username and the primary account key as the password.

trans-unit.source: The primary account key can be found on the **Explore this dataset** page under the description of the web service (click the **show** button).
trans-unit.target: The primary account key can be found on the **Explore this dataset** page under the description of the web service (click the **show** button).

trans-unit.source: The result may display in the browser or it may be available to download, depending on which browser you are using.
trans-unit.target: The result may display in the browser or it may be available to download, depending on which browser you are using.

trans-unit.source: 3. Why do I get the following error message after I enter the input for the web service on the "Explore this dataset" page:
trans-unit.target: 3. Why do I get the following error message after I enter the input for the web service on the "Explore this dataset" page:

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.
trans-unit.target: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.

trans-unit.source: Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Please try again.

trans-unit.source: One or more input parameters of your web service may have exceeded the length limit when consuming the web service on the marketplace **Explore this dataset** page.
trans-unit.target: One or more input parameters of your web service may have exceeded the length limit when consuming the web service on the marketplace **Explore this dataset** page.

trans-unit.source: The services can be called with a longer input length by using HTTP POST methods.
trans-unit.target: The services can be called with a longer input length by using HTTP POST methods.

trans-unit.source: For examples, see [Sample solutions using R on Machine Learning and published to Marketplace](machine-learning-r-csharp-web-service-examples.md).
trans-unit.target: For examples, see [Sample solutions using R on Machine Learning and published to Marketplace](machine-learning-r-csharp-web-service-examples.md).

trans-unit.source: 4. Why do I not see anything in the "API EXPLORER" tab int the Store in the Azure Management Portal?
trans-unit.target: 4. Why do I not see anything in the "API EXPLORER" tab int the Store in the Azure Management Portal?

trans-unit.source: This is a known issue with the Azure Management Portal Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This is a known issue with the Azure Management Portal Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: The team is working to resolve this issue.
trans-unit.target: The team is working to resolve this issue.

trans-unit.source: Questions about publishing from Azure Machine Learning on Marketplace
trans-unit.target: Questions about publishing from Azure Machine Learning on Marketplace

trans-unit.source: 1. Why are my transactions of logos or images not refreshing for my web service?
trans-unit.target: 1. Why are my transactions of logos or images not refreshing for my web service?

trans-unit.source: Logos and images are cached in the publishing portal, and it may take up to 10 days for the new logo or image to update on the portal.
trans-unit.target: Logos and images are cached in the publishing portal, and it may take up to 10 days for the new logo or image to update on the portal.

trans-unit.source: 2. Why is the “Detail" tab of my web service on Marketplace showing an error message?
trans-unit.target: 2. Why is the “Detail" tab of my web service on Marketplace showing an error message?

trans-unit.source: There is a known Marketplace issue when connecting to Azure Machine Learning for service details.
trans-unit.target: There is a known Marketplace issue when connecting to Azure Machine Learning for service details.

trans-unit.source: The team is working to resolve this issue.
trans-unit.target: The team is working to resolve this issue.

trans-unit.source: 3. Why does the R sample code in the Azure Machine Learning web services not work for consuming the web services in Marketplace?
trans-unit.target: 3. Why does the R sample code in the Azure Machine Learning web services not work for consuming the web services in Marketplace?

trans-unit.source: The authentication systems are different when connecting to Azure Machine Learning web services directly compared to connecting to these web services through the Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: The authentication systems are different when connecting to Azure Machine Learning web services directly compared to connecting to these web services through the Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: The services in Marketplace are OData services, and they can be called with GET or POST methods.
trans-unit.target: The services in Marketplace are OData services, and they can be called with GET or POST methods.

trans-unit.source: 4. Why are the support links of my web service offers not updating correctly for some of my offers?
trans-unit.target: 4. Why are the support links of my web service offers not updating correctly for some of my offers?

trans-unit.source: The support links are global per publisher, not per offer.
trans-unit.target: The support links are global per publisher, not per offer.

trans-unit.source: 5. How do I publish a web service with batch input mode in Marketplace?
trans-unit.target: 5. How do I publish a web service with batch input mode in Marketplace?

trans-unit.source: The batch input mode is currently not supported in Marketplace web services.
trans-unit.target: The batch input mode is currently not supported in Marketplace web services.

trans-unit.source: 6. Who should I contact to get help if I have questions about becoming a data publisher, or if I have issues during publishing?
trans-unit.target: 6. Who should I contact to get help if I have questions about becoming a data publisher, or if I have issues during publishing?

trans-unit.source: Please contact the Azure Marketplace team at <datamarketbd@microsoft.com> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Please contact the Azure Marketplace team at <datamarketbd@microsoft.com> for more information.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
